title: Someone won't see the 10 bans coming and that he's never going to set foot on the Rift ever again

replies.body: I see it's hard to post original content nowadays.

The joke

______

...

you

>joke
>jōk/
>*noun*
>noun: joke; plural noun: jokes
>
>   1.
>    a thing that someone says to cause amusement or laughter, especially a story with a funny punchline.
>   "she was in a mood to tell jokes"
>    synonyms:	funny story, jest, witticism, quip; More

Odd... I wasn't amused, nor did I laugh at this "joke".
Somehow, it seems that the Memes & Games section isn't for you...
Indeed.  I like my jokes to be funny, amusing or, at the very least, satiricial and ironic.
hey bro you need to calm down

Doesn't mean you have to be rude to people just because they don't share your sense of humor.

That's like saying "I want my food to taste good" when you like sweets and someone served you something bitter AF.

Basically everything is an opinion after all.

Wasn't being "rude" per se, I was responding to a sarcastic/flip remark with one of my own.  

It's a forum, you express a view, I express a view, they don't have to agree in tone or substance.  Settle down.

You don't get to decide when you were being 'rude' or not. 
It doesn't work that way.

That doesn't actually make any sense.  

I'm pretty sure I know the intent of my remarks better than you do, but thanks for playing.

No.

Random people on the internet always know better than you.  

That's Boards 101 man.

You can intend your remark however you like, but people will interpret it as they will.

If someone thought you came across as rude well then they felt you were being rude.
Not very complicated.
Since when are memes meant to be funny? They're meant to annoy pretentious people like yourself.

Didn't see a meme in this thread, just saw an unfunny attempt at "humor".  

TRY AGAIN?  {Y/N]
i find it funny you dont have a sense of humor, amuse me more hypocrite who just posted in this thread to troll.

I don't understand how I'm a hypocrite... was it because I didn't find something funny that was clearly not at all humorous?  

Ahh public education... keep it going.

you came here to antagonize M&G for your own amusement, Which is petty and BM.

its sad that people like you cant even be funny while trolling, poor excuse for one imho.

You make assumptions of my intent, regardless of the truth.  I saw a thread pop up on the Boards section, I commented, welcome to the way forums and/or Bulletin Board systems have worked for 30 years now.  

I'm not trying to be funny, nor am I trying to troll... interestingly enough one could argue that if I was trolling I am doing so quite effectively as you continue to respond.  

I don't respond to messages on a Board for my amusement, I respond to give an opinion or point of view---again that's kind of the point of a message Board.  Keep trying I guess?  I don't know... you seem to have a comprehension issue.

More like...

{{champion:157}} *Has been banned*

Wind wall THAT, bitch!

*Wind wall consumes the ban*

Wait... what...?

*Yasuo dashes through the champion icons and starts slicing your account's IP and RP down to 0*
Please don't give Riot ideas
But...he can see now.  He's all shiny too and glowie.
He's also an arrogant dick, but I guess that's a given.
He is bald too.
{{champion:161}} ? :<
I didn't include him because he was an eyesore
{{champion:34}} Does she actually ever stand?

And who is setting 50% more foot on the rift after his rework?
{{champion:6}}
Lee and Yas will be absoluted gutted by Riot before players allow them back on the field.

Gutted?
Riot barely touches them.
Then players will never allow them back on the field, I suppose.
They're still fully viable though
Sure. Just, according to Lugg, I guess they'll be permabanned regardless. :)
That's why the player base will perma-ban them. They are sick of Riot playing favorites.

{{champion:421}} 
{{champion:127}}

First I was like "Why the hell would someone ban Rek'Sai?"

Then, unlike them, I started seeing what you did there.
inb4 buffs because he isnt seeing play. Kappa
I guess you could say he'll never see the Rift again.
Here is my top 10 bans :{{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:92}}  There.

Remove Ahri
Add {{champion:10}} 

But honestly, it will be interesting to see who actually is permabanned
Maybe seeing annoying but not OP champions jump to ~75% ban rate (just guessing) will make Rito realize there may be a problem

Ahri is more annoying than Kayle. She is always picked and is really safe and annoying to lane against . but i would probly replace her by Zed because energy assassin is just cancer

That one was a real knee slapper. 

Not trying to be a party pooper, but I do kinda feel bad for Lee Sin mains because if there will be 10 bans, he will NEVER be picked in a ranked game ever again.

{{champion:157}} _I'm joining you in the gutter, friend._

Get out.

Plot twist: he gets through every time.

Then everybody rages at each other for not wasting their own ban. XD
